newsitem.title: USA: AmeriQuest Technologies unit completes sale.
newsitem.headline: AmeriQuest Technologies unit completes sale.

text.p: CMS Enhancements Inc, a wholly owned subsidiary of AmeriQuest Technologies Inc, said it has completed the sale of substantially all of its assets to CMS Peripherals Inc.
CMS Peripherals is a newly formed corporation owned primarily by CMS Enhancements' former management. In connection to the transaction, CMS Enhancements said it plans to change its name to AAG Inc.
AmeriQuest is a distributor of computer technology solutions.

CMS Peripherals is engaged in the business of providing mass storage solutions, sub-assembly storage upgrade products and developing a broad line of storage products for servers, workstations and portable computers.
